mapper.insert: insert into product (name, content, material, price, country , wholesale_price, actual_price, category_no) values (#{name},#{content},#{material},#{price},#{country},#{wholesalePrice},#{actualPrice},#{categoryNo})
mapper.select: select product_no as productNo, name, content,regdate as regDate, updatedate as updateDate, post_weight as postWeight, material,price,country,is_display as isDisplay, is_sale as isSale, wholesale_price as wholesalePrice, actual_price as actualPrice, category_no as categoryNo,product_code as productCode from product
mapper.update: update product set quantity = #{quantity} where product_no=#{productNo}
